Name: Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection occurrences across all cases
Percentage of process variants that include SW-Initial Reviewer Selection
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all cases

Name: Number of times SW-Initial Reviewer Selection is directly followed by SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week
Metric: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection activities that are eventually followed by SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Frequency of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection relative to SW-Awaiting AE Assignment
Metric: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases where SW-Initial Reviewer Selection occurs before any reviewer-related reminder (e.g., Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Number of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection events that lead to at least one SW-Reviewer Agreed within the same case
Metric: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection activities that are not followed by Assign a Different Editor or Unassign Editor
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all cases where 'Assign a Different Editor' does not happen

Name: Frequency of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection compared to RW-Initial Reviewer Selection in revised manuscript tracks
Metric: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities for cases where activity 'RW-Initial Reviewer Selection' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection occurrences that result in a completed review path ending in SW-EIC Accept, SW-EIC Reject, or SW-EIC Major/Minor Revision
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Number of process variants starting with SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion that contain SW-Initial Reviewer Selection
Metric: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection activities occurring after Plagiarism Originality Report Completed but before any SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed'

Name: Frequency of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection in cases that ultimately reach SW-Reviewer Agreed versus those that end in SW-Reviewer No Response or repeated SW-Reviewer Declined
Metric: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Ratio of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection to total reviewer-selection-related activities (including SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week, SW-Reviewer Selection is now due, etc.)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week'
